英文公告.機關名稱: Agricultural Research Institute, Council of Agricultural
英文公告.機關地址: 189 Chung-cheng Road, Wu-feng Taichung, Taiwan 413, ROC
英文公告.標案名稱: Inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer 1 set
英文公告.廠商地址: 15-7F,No.107,Sec. 1, Jhongshan Rd., Sinjhuang Dist., New Taipei City 24250, Taiwan(R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: The major function of this system is for researches on origin identification for agricultural produces. In addition, the system is to carry out the quantitative and/or isotope ratio analysis of trace elements in soil, crops, water, and fertilizers. This system must be functioning when connect with a NEW WAVE UP-213 LA laser ablation system.
